item.description:
Our monthly potluck dinner and business meeting at Gloria's home in Windsor.

This meeting will include nominations for officers for the 2010 year, so please give some thought to whether you will be willing to serve and who else you would like to see fill the officer positions, which include:
--President
--Vice President
--Treasurer
--Secretary
--Membership
--Social
--Webmaster
--Publicity
--Editor
Nominations will then be published in the December newsletter and elections held at the December 4 business meeting.

Other agenda items will include a bylaws change regarding membership fees and planning for our annual anniversary event in February.

And be sure to come with your ideas for events in the upcoming months!

Note that since this event is in a private home, you must RSVP to get directions.

FYI, this home has both a dog and a cat residing here. And the dog is a very active and very large puppy, but I'll ask the teenager to keep him downstairs in the family room, so we can all avoid the 70 pound lap dog!
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
